statements: SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewInsights;
SELECT title, author FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT publication_date, title FROM LiteratureReviewInsights ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT author, insights FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE author LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT title, author, publication_date FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE author='John Doe'
SELECT * FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY author DESC
SELECT author, insights FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE insights LIKE '%interesting%' ORDER BY publication_date ASC
SELECT paper_id, title, publication_date FROM LiteratureReviewInsights WHERE author='Jane Smith' OR author='Alice Johnson'
SELECT author, COUNT(*) AS insight_count FROM LiteratureReviewInsights GROUP BY author HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data;
SELECT title, author, year_published FROM literature_review_data WHERE year_published > 2010;
SELECT author, year_published FROM literature_review_data WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT title, year_published, abstract FROM literature_review_data ORDER BY year_published DESC;
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE chart_type = 'bar' AND x_axis = 'Category' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review_data WHERE year_published > 2010 ORDER BY title DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT author, year_published FROM literature_review_data WHERE author LIKE 'J%' AND year_published BETWEEN 2000 AND 2020;
SELECT id, title, abstract FROM literature_review_data WHERE title ILIKE '%data%' AND abstract ILIKE '%analysis%';
SELECT * FROM visualization_data WHERE chart_type IN ('bar', 'line') AND x_axis = 'Time' ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, chart_type FROM visualization_data WHERE data_source LIKE '%csv%' OR data_source LIKE '%excel%' ORDER BY chart_type, id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM literature_review;
SELECT review_title, review_date FROM literature_review WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT review_title, review_content FROM literature_review ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM visualization WHERE visualization_type = 'Bar Chart';
SELECT review_content, review_title, review_date FROM literature_review;
SELECT analysis_result, analysis_type, analysis_date FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT visualization_output, visualization_type FROM visualization ORDER BY visualization_date DESC;
SELECT review_title, review_content FROM literature_review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT analysis_type, analysis_date FROM data_analysis WHERE analysis_result LIKE '%interesting%';
SELECT * FROM Literature_Review;
SELECT paper_title, author, publication_date FROM Literature_Review ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT author FROM Literature_Review WHERE publication_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT A.paper_title, B.category_name FROM Literature_Review A INNER JOIN Paper_Categories B ON A.paper_id = B.paper_id;
SELECT analysis_id, analysis_date, analysis_results FROM Data_Analysis WHERE analysis_date <= '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Literature_Review;
SELECT paper_title, author FROM Literature_Review WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT paper_title, keywords FROM Literature_Review WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(paper_id) as paper_count FROM Paper_Categories GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM Data_Analysis da JOIN Visualization v ON da.analysis_id = v.analysis_id ORDER BY da.analysis_date DESC, v.visualization_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review;
SELECT paper_title, author FROM literature_review WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT author, topic FROM literature_review ORDER BY author ASC;
SELECT * FROM keywords WHERE keyword LIKE 'data%';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE affiliation IS NOT NULL ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM literature_review WHERE publication_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT id, paper_title, author FROM literature_review ORDER BY paper_title ASC, author DESC;
SELECT overview, analysis, visualization_tool FROM insights WHERE visualization_tool = 'Tableau';
SELECT author_name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE affiliation IN ('University A', 'University B');
SELECT publication_title, publication_year, publisher FROM publications WHERE publication_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
